_header: To thee we make our invocation
Subjects: God, prayers to; prayers, to God
_description: Thomas Hoccleve, ‘Inuocacio ad patrem’ — twenty stanzas rhyme royal

HunHM744.First Lines:
To thee we make oure inuocaciounThow god the fadir which vn to vs
                    alle…
HunHM744.Last Lines:
…And stifly graunte vs in thy cause stondeAnd flitte nat whan
                    we take it on honde
